Masterstroke.name: Masterstroke
Masterstroke.flavor: An unerring strike foretells your enemy’s demise.

Ultimate Parry.name: Ultimate Parry
Ultimate Parry.flavor: With a whirl of your weapon, you expertly deflect an enemy’s attack.
Ultimate Parry.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Ultimate Parry.effect: The damage is reduced by an amount equal to your level.

Weaponsoul Dance.name: Weaponsoul Dance
Weaponsoul Dance.flavor: You leap from one foe to the next, striking with ever-increasing accuracy while negotiating your way through your enemies’ thicket of swords.
Weaponsoul Dance.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target falls prone. In addition, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Weaponsoul Dance.effect: You shift up to 5 squares and can then make the secondary attack.
Weaponsoul Dance.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Weaponsoul Dance.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the tertiary target falls prone. In addition, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Weaponsoul Dance.secondaryeffect: You shift up to 5 squares and can then make the tertiary attack.
Weaponsoul Dance.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
